subject: Basketball (College)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The Brown basketball player Steven Spieth, brother of the No. 1-rated golfer Jordan Spieth, and their sister, Ellie, have been blessed with parents who don’t play favorites.
snippet: The Brown basketball player Steven Spieth, brother of the No. 1-rated golfer Jordan Spieth, and their sister, Ellie, have been blessed with parents who don’t play favorites.
